trans-unit.source: Represents a data-binding converter to handle the visibility of repeat buttons in scrolling menus.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料繫結轉換器來處理重複的捲動功能表按鈕的可見性。

trans-unit.source: The MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter determines whether a menu should display the repeat buttons when a menu has too many items to fit on the screen at once.
trans-unit.target: MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter 會決定功能表有太多的項目，以符合螢幕大小一次時，功能表是否應該顯示重複的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Use the converter with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> that has four bindings.
trans-unit.target: 使用轉換器，並<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>具有四個繫結。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: The four bindings should be to properties of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>: If the menu items are organized vertically (which is the default for menus), bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 父系的內容應該是四個繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>︰ 如果功能表項目會以垂直組織 （這是功能表的預設值），繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If the menu items are organized horizontally, bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能表項目會水平組織，繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to 0 or 100.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>為 0 或 100。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value is treated as a percentage and determines whether a button is hidden when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the given location.
trans-unit.target: 值會被視為百分比，並決定是否要隱藏按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>位於指定位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the top, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 0% and the top button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>頂端的位置是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>為 0%，而且上方的按鈕會隱藏起來。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the bottom, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 100% and the bottom button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>底部的位置是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>是 100%，而且 [底端] 按鈕會隱藏起來。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called when moving a value from a source to a target.
trans-unit.target: 將值從來源移至目標時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the default value should be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>可能會傳回指出轉換器會產生任何值，而且應該使用預設值。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> may be returned to indicate that the binding should not transfer the value or use the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing>可能會傳回表示應該不傳送值或使用預設值繫結。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing>

trans-unit.source: Values produced by the source binding.
trans-unit.target: 來源繫結所產生的值。

trans-unit.source: Type of the target.
trans-unit.target: 目標類型。

trans-unit.source: Type that the source will be converted into.
trans-unit.target: 來源將轉換成的型別。

trans-unit.source: Converter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: Culture information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converted value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。
